name: Pomegranate-Rosemary Jelly
description: Rosemary provides an aromatic flavor to this homemade jelly made using pomegranate â€“ a perfect spread to use over crackers.

recipeInstructions.text: In 8-quart Dutch oven, mix pomegranate juice, rosemary, lemon juice and pectin. Cook over low heat until pectin is dissolved. Heat to boiling over medium-high heat, stirring constantly. Stir in sugar. Heat to rolling boil, stirring constantly; remove from heat. Discard rosemary sprigs.

Immediately pour jelly into 8 sterilized 8-oz jars or freezer containers, leaving 1/2-inch headspace. Wipe jar rims. Seal immediately. Process in boiling water bath 10 minutes. Store in cool, dry place.
